items.summary: Update the homepage hero section to display the owner's name 'Bhupesh Chaudhary', introduce him as an IAS Officer posted in Ladakh, and replace any generic placeholder welcome text with a warm, personal introduction reflecting this identity.

Update the site's navigation bar, footer, page titles, and any 'About' or 'Summary' sections across all pages to reflect the owner's name 'Bhupesh Chaudhary' and role as IAS Officer, Ladakh â€” replacing all generic placeholder identity text.

Seed or pre-populate the backend resume data with a professional summary for Bhupesh Chaudhary identifying him as an IAS Officer currently posted in Ladakh, so the Resume section is not empty on first load.
